author: PFCal-dev
body:
#### PR description:
Similar changes as  #28463 for the HGCAL L1 TPG.

@franzoni @pfs FYI

#### PR validation:
Checked TC ADC values before compression and TC pT, with PR #28463 + this change (blue) and with a fresh `CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-11-26-2300` (orange) :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5569798/69743810-5b43c000-113f-11ea-8df2-e1334aace8b3.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5569798/69743822-60087400-113f-11ea-8fe5-a15328791e6c.png)
title: [HGCal trigger] Use ADC/TDC for scintillator
